sns_root.init_args: (record { governance_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_governance}}"; ledger_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_ledger}}"; swap_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_swap}}"; index_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_index}}"; dapps = vec {}; archive_canister_ids = vec {}; latest_version = opt record {major=0; minor=0; patch=0}})

sns_governance.init_args: (record { root_canister_id = opt principal "{{canisterId:sns_root}}"; id_to_nervous_system_functions = vec {}; metrics = null; maturity_modulation = null; mode = (2 : int32); parameters = opt record { neuron_minimum_stake_e8s = opt (100_000_000 : nat64); max_dissolve_delay_seconds = opt (252_460_800 : nat64); max_neuron_age_for_age_bonus = opt (126_230_400 : nat64); max_dissolve_delay_bonus_percentage = opt (100 : nat64); max_age_bonus_percentage = opt (25 : nat64); initial_voting_period_seconds = opt (345_600 : nat64); wait_for_quiet_deadline_increase_seconds = opt (86_400 : nat64); transaction_fee_e8s = opt (10_000 : nat64); reject_cost_e8s = opt (100_000_000 : nat64) }; is_finalizing_disburse_maturity = null; deployed_version = null; cached_upgrade_steps = null; sns_initialization_parameters = ""; latest_reward_event = null; pending_version = null; swap_canister_id = opt principal "{{canisterId:sns_swap}}"; ledger_canister_id = opt principal "{{canisterId:sns_ledger}}"; proposals = vec {}; in_flight_commands = vec {}; sns_metadata = null; neurons = vec {}; genesis_timestamp_seconds = (0 : nat64); target_version = null; timers = null; upgrade_journal = null })

sns_ledger.init_args: (record { minting_account = record { owner = principal "{{canisterId:sns_governance}}" }; initial_balances = vec {}; transfer_fee = 10_000; token_name = "My SNS Token"; token_symbol = "MST"; metadata = vec {}; archive_options = record { num_blocks_to_archive = 1000; trigger_threshold = 2000; controller_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_root}}" } })

sns_swap.init_args: (record { nns_governance_canister_id = principal "rrkah-fqaaa-aaaaa-aaaaq-cai"; sns_governance_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_governance}}"; sns_root_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_root}}"; sns_ledger_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_ledger}}"; fallback_controller_principal_ids = vec { principal "blmyj-3vn2k-4bepw-gjtre-gx7au-xcec2-zitym-kxm7j-yzgqg-k6ztg-fae" }; transaction_fee_e8s = opt (10_000 : nat64); neuron_basket_construction_parameters = opt record { count = (2 : nat32); dissolve_delay_interval_seconds = (2630016 : nat64) }; })
